tinyfiledialogs 3.19.1
  • Reference

Save a file

saveFileDialog.Rd

Prompt the user to save a file with a given extension using a system dialog.

Usage

saveFileDialog(
  title = "Save File",
  filepath = getwd(),
  filters = "",
  description = ""
)

Arguments

title

base::character Window title

filepath

base::character A default filename and/or path

filters

base::character File extension filter patterns

description

base::character Generic file type descriptor string

Value

A character(1) of the selected file, or NULL if the dialog was cancelled.
